Package controllers

Class SuggestionController

java.lang.Object
controllers.SuggestionController
All Implemented Interfaces:
SuggestionControlInterface
public class SuggestionController extends Object implements SuggestionControlInterface
Represents the SuggestionController class Holds a list of Suggestion objects Holds all methods to interface with the Suggestion object Created and held by the Controller ENUM
Since:
2021-11-24
Version:
1.1
Author:
Teo Xuan Ming

    • add

      public int add(Map.Entry<CampAspect,? extends Object> suggestion, String rationale) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Overriden methods from SuggestionControlInterface Creates a new suggestion, each suggestion contains only one aspect of CampInfo @see CampInfo i.e. Multiple suggestions are separate entries in the suggestions HashMap adds it to the list of suggestions in MainController's attributes also tags the suggestion to the camp and user
      Specified by:
      add in interface SuggestionControlInterface
      Parameters:
      suggestion - the suggestion aspect text to be added
      rationale - the rationale for the suggestion
      Returns:
      the suggestion id if successful
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException - if the camp or user is not found

    • edit

      public int edit(int id, Map.Entry<CampAspect,? extends Object> edited, String rationale) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Overriden methods from SuggestionControlInterface Edit a suggestion based on the suggestion id Updates the suggestion aspect and rationale Updates the last updated date
      Specified by:
      edit in interface SuggestionControlInterface
      Parameters:
      id - the suggestion id to be edited
      edited - the new suggestion aspect object
      rationale - the new rationale
      Returns:
      the suggestion id if successful throws controller item missing exception if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException - if the suggestion cannot be found
